9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Messenger of Allah only performed the Sa'i of the House and of As-Safa and Al-Marwah to show his strength to the idolaters

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السَّعْىِ بَيْنَ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Sa'i between As-Safa and Al-Marwah
